name: Space Train (RelaX92)
description:
Theme explanation:

It's an endless game, so doesn't matter how much time passes, it will never be done.

Instructions:

Requires SteamVR, so you can rebind the Inputs.

Controls:

Teleportation:    Thumbstick (All except Vive), Trackpad (Vive)
Shoot:    Trigger (All)
Pickup: Grip (All)
Eject Magazine: Grip (All), B (Index)
Toggle between Hand and Gun: Trackpad Touch (Index, Mixed Reality), Menu (Vive), B & Y (Oculus)

You can store full magazines in your backpack. Just hold the hand with magazine behind your back and drop it (Release Pickup). You can get them out by picking up (Press Pickup) with an empty open hand behind your back.

List any content that was created before the jam that was included in the final submission.:

  • Ambient Sound: Spaceship Ambient.wav by BatuhanYldz https://freesound.org/people/BatuhanYldz/sounds/506751/
  • Button Sound: Button 02.wav by JarredGibb https://freesound.org/people/JarredGibb/sounds/219479/
  • Gate Sound: Gate .wav by Danelle150055Venter https://freesound.org/people/Danelle150055Venter/sounds/326325/
  • Eject Magazine: Ejecting Magazine.wav by morganpurkis https://freesound.org/people/morganpurkis/sounds/379978/
  • Load Magazine: Berretta 9mm Quick Reload & Single Cock.wav by Paul368 https://freesound.org/people/Paul368/sounds/169194/
  • AI by Tom Looman https://github.com/tomlooman/EpicSurvivalGameSeries
  • Assets: Scifi Kitbash Level Builder by Denys Rutkovskyi https://www.unrealengine.com/marketplace/en-US/item/cfa1cd2d54434d8689b60866e2ce...
  • Robot: Sci Fi Robot by Dspazio https://www.unrealengine.com/marketplace/en-US/product/sci-fi-robot-01
  • VR Default Template
  • Animations: Mixamo Bash Animation and 3rd Person Template Animations
